description:
Sexy Sydnee Capri is a favorite here at Cybernet and I found out why during my first shoot with her. Besides being sexy, she's tough, has a great attitude and took everything I threw at her. Included: a wrist gag using her own wrist, a very mean tongue tie, again, using her own tongue, a suspension, a standing predicament bondage with electrical tape and a stringent tie in a tub with fishingline. On top of that she stayed in high heels for me for the entire shoot!!
Thank you Sydnee!
title: Sydnee Capri
